mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are two copies of this blank receipt for items "Bought of H. L. Walker, Butcher and Dealer in Fresh Meats, Oysters, Fish and Dressed Fowls in Season." At the top is a printed space for the date to be written in: Lexington, Va. ___________ 191" indicating these were used prior to 1920. Photocopies of filled out versions of these receipts can be seen in WLUColl0294_b01_f013_001 and WLUColl0294_b01_f013_002.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipt for items Bought of H. L. Walker
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Receipts (Acknowledgments)
Walker and Wood Brothers
